Returns:
AccessToken from the OAuth of the Applications

createPaging

public static twitter4j.Paging createPaging()
createPaging creates the paging Item as determined by TWITTER_PAGING_MODE

Returns:
Paging with the defined limits

getDefaultStatusId

public static java.lang.Long getDefaultStatusId()
getDefaultStatusId is used to get a status ID to act as a starting point.
It is only called when there isn't an entry already in the datastore.

Based upon the TWITTER_PAGING_COUNT value, it goes to the oldest update then returns that statusID to be the first one to be used.

Returns:
Long The status ID
